metadata.title: CVE-2023-6516 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Specific recursive query patterns may lead to an out-of-memory condition

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
bind9-host - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
bind9-libs - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
bind9-utils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
bind9utils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
dnsutils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2').
isc-dhcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
